subject: Law
title: LLCs: Best of Both Worlds
description: A fast breakdown of LLCs: Best of Both Worlds for builders.

hook.text: Want corporate protection but partnership simplicity? The LLC was invented for exactly that purpose.

buildup.text: A Limited Liability Company shields owners' personal assets while allowing flexible management and tax treatment.

discovery.text: LLCs can choose to be taxed as sole proprietorships, partnerships, or corporations. Members decide the structure.

twist.text: The liability shield isn't absolute. Courts can 'pierce the veil' if members mix personal and business funds.

climax.text: LLCs are now the most popular business form in America. Their flexibility is their biggest selling point.

punchline.text: Protection plus flexibility. The LLC is business law's greatest invention.

quiz.question: When can courts 'pierce the veil' of an LLC?
options: When the LLC earns too much
When members mix personal and business funds
When the LLC has too many members
